name: Classic Apple Pie
description: Traditional American apple pie with a flaky crust and cinnamon-spiced apple filling
instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 425°F.
2. Peel and slice apples.
3. Mix apples with sugar, cinnamon, and flour.
4. Place bottom crust in pie pan.
5. Add apple filling and dot with butter.
6. Cover with top crust and seal edges.
7. Cut vents in top crust.
8. Bake for 45-50 minutes until golden brown.

name: BBQ Baby Back Ribs
description: Tender, fall-off-the-bone baby back ribs with smoky BBQ sauce
instructions:
1. Remove membrane from ribs.
2. Mix dry rub ingredients.
3. Coat ribs with dry rub.
4. Wrap in foil and refrigerate 2 hours.
5. Preheat oven to 275°F.
6. Bake wrapped ribs for 2.5 hours.
7. Remove foil, brush with BBQ sauce.
8. Bake uncovered 30 minutes more.

name: Honey Baklava
description: Layers of phyllo pastry filled with nuts and sweetened with honey syrup
instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F.
2. Mix chopped nuts with cinnamon.
3. Layer phyllo sheets, brushing each with butter.
4. Add nut mixture between layers.
5. Cut into diamond shapes.
6. Bake 45 minutes until golden.
7. Heat honey and pour over hot baklava.
8. Cool completely before serving.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, parmesan, and croutons
instructions:
1. Wash and chop romaine lettuce.
2. Make dressing with anchovies, lemon juice, and oil.
3. Toss lettuce with dressing.
4. Add grated parmesan cheese.
5. Top with croutons.
6. Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Aromatic and spicy chicken curry with coconut milk and traditional spices
instructions:
1. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces.
2. Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger.
3. Add curry powder and cook 1 minute.
4. Add chicken and brown.
5. Add tomatoes and coconut milk.
6. Simmer 20 minutes until chicken is cooked.
7. Serve with rice.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil
instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 475°F.
2. Roll out pizza dough.
3. Spread tomato sauce evenly.
4. Add torn mozzarella pieces.
5. Drizzle with olive oil.
6. Bake 12-15 minutes until crust is golden.
7. Top with fresh basil leaves.
8. Slice and serve hot.

name: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes studded with chocolate chips, perfect for breakfast
instructions:
1. Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
2. Whisk together milk, eggs, and melted butter.
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
4. Fold in chocolate chips.
5. Heat griddle or pan over medium heat.
6. Pour batter to form pancakes.
7. Cook until bubbles form, then flip.
8. Serve with syrup.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Seasoned ground beef tacos with fresh toppings and soft tortillas
instructions:
1. Brown ground beef in a skillet.
2. Drain excess fat.
3. Add taco seasoning and water.
4. Simmer 10 minutes.
5. Warm tortillas.
6. Fill tortillas with beef.
7. Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese.
8. Serve with sour cream.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection with lemon and herbs
instructions:
1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
2. Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and dill.
3. Season salmon with salt and pepper.
4. Marinate salmon in oil mixture 15 minutes.
5. Grill salmon 4-5 minutes per side.
6. Cook until internal temperature reaches 145°F.
7. Serve with lemon wedges.

name: Chocolate Mousse
description: Rich and creamy chocolate mousse dessert with whipped cream
instructions:
1. Melt chocolate and butter in double boiler.
2. Separate eggs.
3. Beat egg yolks with sugar until pale.
4. Combine chocolate with egg yolk mixture.
5. Whip cream to soft peaks.
6. Beat egg whites to stiff peaks.
7. Fold cream and whites into chocolate.
8. Chill 2 hours before serving.
